title: Understanding Data Integration
text: Data integration involves combining data from different sources to provide a unified view. It is essential for businesses to make informed decisions.

title: Key Components
text: The key components of a data integration system include data sources, transformation tools, and data storage solutions.

title: Identifying Components
text: Which of the following is a component of a data integration system?
choices: Data sources that provide raw data
Transformation tools that clean and format data
Data storage solutions for processed data
